Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.match_items

Class DevelopmentGrid

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.match_items.DevelopmentGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStatus
public class DevelopmentGrid extends Object implements HasStatus
The DevelopmentGrid is meant to contain the SupplyCard, divided by level and color in three rows and four columns, every box of the DevelopmentGrid is made of four SupplyCard. The first row is for level three SupplyCard, the second row is for level two SupplyCard and the third is for level one SupplyCard. The first column is for green SupplyCard, the second column is for blue SupplyCard, the third is for yellow SupplyCard and the fourth is for purple SupplyCard.

    • buyCard

      public DevelopmentCard buyCard​(int column, int row, Paycheck p, LeadersSpace leadersSpace) throws SupplyException, NoSuchCardException
      Returns the first card in the row x column position in the DevelopmentGrid if the Paycheck contains all the supplies required to buy the SupplyCard.
      Parameters:
      column - is the column number (between 0 and 3)
      row - is the row number (between 0 and 2)
      p - contains resources to buy a SupplyCard
      leadersSpace - is the LeaderCard container
      Returns:
      the chosen SupplyCard if the Paycheck contains the right supplies
      Throws:
      SupplyException - the Paycheck doesn't contain the right supplies to buy the chosen SupplyCard
      NoSuchCardException - the row x column position is empty

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard​(ActionTilesStack.ActionTile color) throws NoSuchCardException
      Removes a card of the specified color. It tries to remove first cards of level 1, then 2, then 3.
      Parameters:
      color - style to remove
      Throws:
      NoSuchCardException - cards of specified color are not present

    • getBoughtCards

      public int getBoughtCards()

      the number of cards that have been bought

      Whether one card category has no remaining cards in the grid.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel​(int column, int row) throws NoSuchCardException
      Returns the level of the SupplyCard contained in the given position.
      Parameters:
      column - is the column number
      row - is the row number
      Returns:
      the level of the SupplyCard in the given position
      Throws:
      NoSuchCardException - the place is empty

    • getStatus

      public ArrayList<Integer> getStatus()
      The status contains all the id's of the cards in the grid. 0 if the card has been removed. The status is made this way: lvl 3 cards green blue yellow violet lvl 2 cards green blue yellow violet lvl 1 cards green blue yellow blue and its repeated for four times
      Specified by:
      getStatus in interface HasStatus
      Returns:
      the ArrayList made of 48 Integer

    • notifyViews

      public void notifyViews()
      Notify to the ModelObserver the status of the DevelopmentGrid so the players can have this item updated in real time

    • fill

      private void fill​(boolean type)
      Puts the cards in the grid (in two possible ways)
      Parameters:
      type - if true fills the grid with cards in a specific order, if false fills the grid in a random way
